name: Oktopost Tracking Code
author: Liad Guez

sections.description:
Oktopost’s WordPress plugin allows Oktopost customers to install the Oktopost tracking code on their WordPress websites and blogs.

About the code

  • The code is loaded asynchronously, so it won’t slow down your site
  • We automatically use https when appropriate
  • The code can be used across multiple websites and subdomains
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard:

  1. From your dashboard, click on “Plugins” in the left sidebar
  2. Add a new plugin
  3. Search for “Oktopost”
  4. Install “Oktopost Tracking Code”
  5. Once Installed, click Settings → Oktopost
  6. Enter your Oktopost Account ID (can be found under My Profile) and press Save Changes

Manually via FTP:

  1. Unzip the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Once installed, go to Settings → Oktopost, enter your Oktopost Account Id and save changes
